content.heading: Welcome
content.text:
This session explores how to cultivate greater self-compassion for ourselves.

Find a comfortable position and begin the exercise when you are ready.

content.heading: Reflection
content.text: You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own.

How was that experience for you? 

What would the benefit of practicing self-compassion be for you? 

How might you take one or more of these reflections and integrate them into your life? 

How could these practices/reflections be applied to how you relate, think about, and interact with others?
content.heading: Reflection
What would the benefit of self-compassion be for you?
How might you integrate self compassion into your life?
How could self compassion impact how you relate to others?

content.text:
Well done. Today, we’ve explored self-compassion.

A high number of children and adults struggle with anxiety, and self-esteem and self-worth. The expectations of society compound this and can be internalized in unhealthy ways. It is, therefore, especially important to practice self-compassion.
content.heading: Compassion

content.text: Self-compassion can provide us with a route to soften (or alleviate) our internal self-critic, cultivate forgiveness for ourselves and treat ourselves with the tenderness and nurturing kindness we need and deserve.
content.heading: Compassion

content.text:
If we're up for it, we can continue with a mission: Practice self-compassion once a day when we fail, or something doesn’t go as planned over the next three days.

Plan the steps you will take by considering what you need to practice to implement self-compassion.
content.heading: Compassion

en.name: Self Compassion

hostNotes.text: > Press play to start the exercise

en.description: Sometimes, it can be challenging at first to offer the same compassionate response to ourselves as we do to our friends. Self-compassion is when we show kindness and compassion to ourselves in the same way we do for others.

hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Well done.

Summary.

If you’re up for it, you can continue with this mission.

mission description

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

pt-BR.description: Às vezes, pode ser difícil, no começo, oferecer a nós mesmos a mesma compaixão que oferecemos aos nossos amigos. Autocompaixão é justamente tratar a si mesmo com a mesma gentileza e cuidado que você teria com outra pessoa.

hostNotes.text: >Pressione play para iniciar o exercício

pt-BR.name: Autocompaixão

content.heading: Bem-vindo(a)
content.text:
Esta sessão explora como cultivar mais atenção e consciência ao focar na nossa respiração.

Encontre uma posição confortável e inicie o exercício quando estiver pronto.

content.heading: Reflexão
content.text: Você pode anotar em um papel ou apenas mentalmente. Não há certo ou errado aqui, nossas respostas são pessoais.

content.heading: Reflexão
content.text:
Como foi essa experiência para você?

Qual seria o benefício de praticar autocompaixão para você?

Como você pode levar uma ou mais dessas reflexões para a sua vida?

Como essas práticas ou reflexões poderiam ser aplicadas na forma como você se relaciona, pensa sobre e interage com os outros?

content.heading: Qual seria o benefício da autocompaixão para você?
Como você pode integrar a autocompaixão na sua vida?
Como a autocompaixão pode impactar a forma como você se relaciona com os outros?
Compaixão
content.text:
Muito bem. Hoje exploramos a autocompaixão.

Um grande número de crianças e adultos enfrenta dificuldades com ansiedade, autoestima e autovalor. As expectativas da sociedade agravam esse quadro e podem ser internalizadas de forma prejudicial. Por isso, é especialmente importante praticar a autocompaixão.

content.heading: Compaixão
content.text: A autocompaixão pode nos oferecer um caminho para suavizar (ou aliviar) o nosso crítico interno, cultivar o perdão por nós mesmos e nos tratar com a ternura e a gentileza acolhedora de que precisamos e merecemos.

content.heading: Compaixão
content.text:
Se quisermos, podemos continuar com uma sugestão: praticar a autocompaixão uma vez por dia, sempre que falharmos ou algo não sair como planejado, nos próximos três dias.

Planeje os passos que você irá tomar considerando o que precisa praticar para implementar a autocompaixão.
